title: Confined Tandem Catalytic Quasi-Solid Sulfur Reversible Conversion for All-Solid-State Na-S Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01750A, Paper
Weiwei Zhang, Bin Song, Mingli Wang, Tingting Miao, Xianglong Huang, Erhuan Zhang, Xiaowen Zhan, Yue Yang, Hong Zhang, Ke Lu
Controlling the complex, multiphase sulfur/polysulfide redox process is a fundamental pathway to alleviate the cathodic passivation and unlock the high energy potentials of all-solid-state Na-S electrochemistry. Herein, by employing a...
